heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_obsidian_destroyer
heroes.bio_loc: 一个高傲且强横的种族中的一员，先兆者，徘徊于虚空裂隙，他是整个世界与创世深渊之间唯一的卫士。在这充斥着星体残片的殁境中，他凝视着天穹，警觉的提防着繁星之外那无底深渊中的任何骚动。在他非凡的智慧中，深藏着对先兆的敏锐洞察力和强烈共鸣，他心中那曲黑暗的协奏曲暗示着：总有一天，在这深渊之中，在那造化之外，会有某种东西醒来，并且注意到我们的世界。由于太专注于监视星体，殁境神蚀者对太阳附近的事件并不关心。然而，随着遗迹发出战争的召唤，随着心中那潜在的危机感不断扩大，殁境神蚀者展开双翼，向着我们的世界飞来。在预言中，先兆者的地位不言而喻：他的出现即是灾厄的征兆。何况，他已然亲临。
heroes.hype_loc: 殁境神蚀者禁锢敌人后窃取其神智，将生人的智力转化为毁灭的力量。他运用奥术能量发动猛攻，他的终极冲击能粉碎敌人的心智，即使侥幸逃生也将被消去魔法。
heroes.npe_desc_loc: 可以禁锢英雄，使他们无敌

abilities.name: obsidian_destroyer_arcane_orb
abilities.desc_loc: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Destroyer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool.
abilities.lore_loc: Harbinger's outworldly knowledge allows it to tap into the ebb and flow of all spiritual energy, infusing it into his being.
notes_loc: The damage is calculated after the mana cost is spent.

abilities.name: obsidian_destroyer_astral_imprisonment
abilities.desc_loc: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals damage to the target and steals a percentage of their max mana.
abilities.lore_loc: Locked away in the pocket between this world and the Outworld, victims realize their infantile knowledge and mortality.
notes_loc: Imprisoned units can still be hit by Sanity's Eclipse.
Max mana steal does not increase Outworld Destroyer's current mana values or directly reduce the victim's mana values.
abilities.shard_loc: Astral Imprisonment now deals damage in an area. Also allows allies to move at %allied_movement_speed_pct%%% movement speed during Astral Imprisonment (they are visible, but untargettable and can't perform any other actions).
facets_loc: Affected Heroes gain a Mana Allergy Debuff for %debuff_duration% seconds, healing Outworld Destroyer every time they cast a spell.

abilities.name: obsidian_destroyer_equilibrium
abilities.desc_loc: Passively grants a chance to restore a percentage of your max mana each time you cast an ability.
abilities.lore_loc: The Outworld is awash in arcane energy, inclined to diffuse through any of Harbinger's rifts.
notes_loc: Break prevents the Aghanim's Scepter effect from triggering.
abilities.shard_loc: Casting Astral Imprisonment on an ally will trigger Essence Aura on them and grant then %shard_bonus_mana% max mana for %shard_mana_duration% seconds.
abilities.scepter_loc: Damage that would bring Outworld Destroyer below %scepter_barrier_threshold%%% health triggers a strong dispel. In addition, when the effect is triggered Outworld Destroyer consumes of all his mana to create an all damage barrier equal to %scepter_max_mana_barrier_pct%%% of his maximum mana that lasts for %scepter_barrier_duration% seconds. This effect can occur every %scepter_barrier_cooldown% seconds and cannot be refreshed.
facets_loc: When Essence Flux restores mana, it also temporarily increases maximum mana.

abilities.name: obsidian_destroyer_ominous_discernment
abilities.desc_loc: Outworld Destroyer gains an additional %bonus_max_mana_per_int% mana per point of Intelligence.

abilities.name: obsidian_destroyer_sanity_eclipse
abilities.desc_loc: Unleashes a psychic blast that deals damage to enemies based on the difference between your mana and the target's mana. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment. Deals bonus damage to illusions.
abilities.lore_loc: When an Outworld crystal ruptures, cataclysmic energies are released, and the reverberations of this power are felt interdimensionally.
facets_loc: Affected Heroes gain a Mana Allergy Debuff for %debuff_duration% seconds, healing Outworld Destroyer every time they cast a spell.

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_outworld_devourer_3
talents.name_loc: +{s:bonus_mana_as_ms}% of Current Mana as Movement Speed

facets.description_loc: When Essence Flux restores mana, it also temporarily increases maximum mana.
facets.name: obsidian_destroyer_obsidian_decimator

facets.description_loc: Heroes affected by Astral Imprisonment and Sanity's Eclipse heal Outworld Destroyer every time they cast a spell.
facets.name: obsidian_destroyer_overwhelming_devourer

new_abilities.name: obsidian_destroyer_ominous_discernment
new_abilities.desc_loc: Outworld Destroyer gains an additional %bonus_max_mana_per_int% mana per point of Intelligence.
